markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Turn to Mist](/Feats.aspx?ID=3553) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Divine" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=48" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 59</row>

**Archetype** [Vampire](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=181)

**Frequency**
once per day

**Prerequisites**
[Vampire Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3545)

</column>

---

You turn into vapor, gaining the effects of [_gaseous form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=129).

<title level="2">Turn to Mist leads to...</title>
[Mist Escape](/Feats.aspx?ID=3555)
name: Turn to Mist
